mapper.select: select * from musical_schedule where mu_sch_date=#{param1} and venue_id=#{param2} and musical_id=#{param3}
mapper.update: update musical_schedule set seat_count =#{param1} where mu_sch_id= #{param2}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO musical_schedule ( mu_sch_id, musical_id, venue_id, mu_sch_date, mu_sch_time, hall_id, seat_count ) VALUES ( #{mu_sch_id }, #{musical_id }, #{venue_id }, #{mu_sch_date}, #{mu_sch_time}, #{hall_id }, #{seat_count} )
